body.p:
Louisa Ky
Dec 4th 1865
To His Exelency
Thos E. Bramlett
Govenor of Kentucky
Honored Sir

I address you in behalf of Wm R Holbrook who was a private Soldier in my Regt He had a Dificulty with one Floyd Roberts (who when Drinking is a Quarellsome man) a Citizen Some 2 years ago at our Last Court he paid Roberts $150.00 as damage & allowed a Judgement for $100.00 & costs to be Entered against him for Shooting & wounding Roberts Wm Holbrook is a poor man & has paid in Lawyer Fees & all $300 if his Land Sells it will Leave him homeless with a Helpless Family His own Health is Poor & he is truly or has been a Quiet Citizen if Consistent with his ideas of Right I would like to have him Remit his Fine

Yours with High Regard
Geo W Gallup
The accompanying Petition is Signed by the Best men of my County

Lawrence Cir Ct
vs
Wm R Holbrook
$100,
Remitted 15 Dec /65
